name: Wooden Pickaxe
description: A basic pickaxe made of wood, suitable for mining stone and coal.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description: A stronger pickaxe made of stone, used for mining iron ore and other blocks.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A durable pickaxe made of iron, capable of mining diamonds and gold.

name: Golden Pickaxe
description: A quick but fragile pickaxe made of gold, useful for certain ores.

name: Diamond Pickaxe
description: A powerful pickaxe made of diamond, efficient for mining all ores.

name: Netherite Pickaxe
description: The strongest pickaxe, made of netherite, highly durable and efficient.

name: Enchanted Wooden Pickaxe
description: A magical wooden pickaxe with enhanced properties.
